    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Deactivate Portfolio Re-design fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_properties");
gr.addQuery('name', 'standard_portfolio_construct.turn_on');
gr.query();
gr.next();
var standardPortfolio = gr.value + '' == 'true' ? true : false;
if (standardPortfolio) {
    // Hide BR SPM: Initiate Normalize Metric Scores
    gs.info('Disabling Business Rule SPM: Initiate Normalize Metric Scores');
    gr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
    if (gr.get('4f40b766372023006289cc9fbe41f135')) {
        gr.setValue('active', false);
        gr.update();
        gs.info('Disabled Business Rule SPM: Initiate Normalize Metric Scores');
    }
}]]></script>
